# Workflow examples

```{r}
library(minfi)
library(HDF5Array)

path <- "remethdb_h5se_gm_00-00-01_1583780004"
h5gm <- loadHDF5SummarizedExperiment(path)


# test preprocessing 
pre.ill <- preprocessIllumina(mset)
pre.noob <- preprocessNoob(mset)
pre.swan <- preprocessSWAN(mset)

```


# Differential methylation



```{r}

mset <- mapToGenome(h5gm)

path <- ""
h5rg <- loadHDF5SummarizedExperiment("")
pill <- preprocessIllumina(h5rg)
pnoob <- preprocessNoob(pill)
cb <- ComBat(pnoob)


```
